title: Fitness test scores - mean of data

content.description: The raw scores presented are the results of a fitness test for first year college students:
content.question: 20, 42, 37, 46, 24, 42, 34, 26, 42, 27 What is the mean of the distribution of the raw scores presented?

skill.text: 3.B: Calculate and interpret measures of central tendency, variation, and percentile rank in a given data set.
